mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCTNAME, FILENAME, COLOR, COUNT, PRICE, SALE, MEMBERNO, STOCK, STOCKNO, PRODUCTSIZE FROM CART C JOIN STOCK S USING(STOCKNO) JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCTNO) WHERE MEMBERNO = #{memberNo}
SELECT * FROM CART WHERE MEMBERNO=#{memberNo} AND STOCKNO=#{stockNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET COUNT=#{cnt} WHERE MEMBERNO=#{memberNo} AND STOCKNO=#{stockNo}
